caption.p: Scavenging activity of EPS against free radicals at (a) 100 μg/ml and (b) 200 μg/ml. EPS-A: EPS produced by P. pulmonarius in submerged culture without agro-wastes, EPS-B: EPS produced by P. pulmonarius in submerged culture with groundnut shell, EPS-C: EPS produced by P. pulmonarius in submerged culture with coconut husk, EPS-D: EPS produced by P. pulmonarius in submerged culture with pineapple peel,. BHT: butylated hydroxytoluene. Error bar: SD.
